section_title: Osteochondral Allograft Transplantation - Knee (Evidence: pg no: 21, L942)
names: Osteochondral allograft transplantation (Evidence: pg no: 21, L943)
description: Osteochondral allograft transplantation to treat cartilaginous defects of the knee (Evidence: pg no: 21, L943-L948)
scope: Treatment of knee cartilage defects (Evidence: pg no: 21, L942-L948)

documentation: Size of cartilage defect is greater than or equal to 1.0 cm2 in total area, as documented by MRI or arthroscopy (Evidence: pg no: 21, L945-L946)
Condition involves focal, full thickness, grade III or IV isolated defect of weight-bearing surface of medial or lateral femoral condyles or trochlear region (Evidence: pg no: 21, L947-L948)

codes.description: Osteochondral allograft, knee, open [when specified as osteochondral allograft] (Evidence: pg no: 24, L1057)
Arthroscopy, knee, surgical; osteochondral allograft (eg, mosaicplasty) (Evidence: pg no: 24, L1061)
